Package csc1035.project2.booking

Class RoomBooking

java.lang.Object
csc1035.project2.booking.RoomBooking
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBooking
public class RoomBooking
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBooking
A class that allows the user to book rooms and produce timetables for a room

    • reserveRoom

      public boolean reserveRoom​(Room r, Module m, java.time.LocalDateTime from, java.time.LocalDateTime to)
      This method makes a new room reservation for a given module, and from/to a given time
      Specified by:
      reserveRoom in interface IBooking
      Parameters:
      r - The given Room that is being reserved
      m - The given Module that the room is being reserved for
      from - The time that the room will be reserved from
      to - The time that the room will be reserved until
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if the reservation was made successfully, returns 0 otherwise

    • cancelRoom

      public boolean cancelRoom​(Room r, Module m, java.time.LocalDateTime from, java.time.LocalDateTime to)
      This is a method to delete a reservation
      Specified by:
      cancelRoom in interface IBooking
      Parameters:
      r - The room that the reservation is in
      m - The module that the reservation is for
      from - The date when the reservation will start
      to - The date when the reservation will end
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if the reservation was deleted successfully, returns 0 otherwise

    • findAvailableRooms

      public java.util.ArrayList<Room> findAvailableRooms​(java.time.LocalDateTime timeStamp, int forLength, int forCapacity)
      This is a method that returns a list of available rooms given certain parameters
      Specified by:
      findAvailableRooms in interface IBooking
      Parameters:
      timeStamp - When the reservation should start
      forLength - How long the reservation should go on for in minutes
      forCapacity - How many people the room should hold
      Returns:
      A list of applicable rooms

      public boolean updateRoomInfo​(java.lang.String roomNumber, Room newRoom)
      This is a method to update room information
      Specified by:
      updateRoomInfo in interface IBooking
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The unique identifier for the room that is to be updated
      newRoom - The room information to be put in for the given roomNumber
